parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.08

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Locations

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a string of a [[Location]]'s class name or [[Task]]'s name (same as [[taskName]]).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''type''' location

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> location: [[Location]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> '''type''' task

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> task: [[Task]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[String]] - the type of the task
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_locationType = [[type]] myLocation;</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_taskName = [[type]] myTask;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setType]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
